title: Adani firm raises offer for Lanco Amarkantak Power for second time
description: Adani Power had offered Rs 3,650 crore, as reported by ET on November 2. The unsolicited offers are made almost 10-11 months after 95% of lenders voted for a plan by the Power Finance Corp (PFC) led consortium.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
